i++){\n            int[] nums = mat[i];\n            \n            int [] tmp = new int[w];\n            System.arraycopy(nums, 0, tmp, 0,w);\n            \n            if(i%2==0){\n                reverse(nums, 0,w-k-1);\n                reverse(nums,w-k, w-1);\n                reverse(nums, 0, w-1);\n                \n                if(check(nums, tmp)==false)\n                    return false;\n                \n            }else{\n                reverse(nums, 0, k-1);\n                reverse(nums, k, w-1);\n                reverse(nums, 0, w-1);\n                 \n                if(check(nums, tmp)==false)\n                    return false;\n            }\n            \n        }\n        return true;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    private boolean check(int[] nums, int[] tmp){\n        for(int i=0;
